about_the_game:
Twisted Tower Tactics is a roguelike tower defense game where you build traps and towers to defend your Commander.

Explore

Each map is generated with a unique seed, and has many special tiles you can encounter such as bosses, shops and challenges. It's up to you to select how you want to explore.

Raid

The tiles themselves are often already settled by the invaders' own buildings which can be destroyed by building your towers next to them, giving you rewards or preventing the enemy to become stronger depending on the type of building.

Grow

Throughout a playthrough you will unlock new towers, upgrades and artifacts granting your defenses even more power. To further aid you your Commander has abilities of their own which you'll have to make use of when the invaders are attacking.

Defend

The game consists of three acts, each with an adversary who has their own set of invading units which will grow increasingly complex the further you progress. Survive against 30 waves of invading forces to drive them out once and for all.

short_description: You have awoken from your century long slumber only to find out your domain has been occupied by invading forces. Drive these invaders out and reclaim what is rightfully yours in this roguelike tower defense game.
